description.value:
Dragonborn culture is intense and exciting, leading those raised within it to be striking and remarkable individuals.

Draconic Lore. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.QxG6sMhZ35eTBC4P]{Draconic Lore} You gain proficiency with one of the following skills of your choice: Arcana, History, Nature, or Survival.

Dragon Sorcery. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Bo9tmqqNVBjrwzIJ]{Dragon Sorcery} You know the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Z9FETGPT6M1R0JBX]{Gust} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.MI9FS18LGRMV16S6]{Absorb Elements} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.HMLDWBDO71VFLVSX]{Dragon's Breath} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
